ref: 12315a †*śambākāra -- ʻ second ploughing ʼ, śambākr̥ta -- ʻ twice ploughed ʼ lex., śambākr̥ -- ʻ to plough twice or in both directions ʼ Pāṇ., śamba -- ʻ anulōmakarṣaṇa -- ; partic. measure of length ʼ lex. [śámba -- ʻ weapon ʼ RV., ʻ tiller, rudder ʼ in śambín -- ʻ boatman ʼ AV.]
A. samār (phonet. x -- ) ʻ second ploughing crosswise ʼ AFD 122.
